name: Memes Never Die
description:
Memes come and go. Create your own meme and try to Keep it Alive!

Created in 48 hours from scratch for Ludum Dare 46.

Game Objective: Stop your meme from dying by talking to everyone in town and placing posters in every spot you can see!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Key - Move
  • Space - Talk/Place Poster
  • Escape - Pause
  • Left Mouse - Draw
